Headline: #94 California Temporary Reroute near California/Wellington
ShortDescription: 94 California buses temp. rerouted NB: California, Diversey, Western, Belmont, & Rockwell; SB: Rockwell, Addison, Western, Belmont, & California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near California/Wellington

Northbound buses will operate via California, Diversey, Western, Belmont, & Rockwell

Southbound buses will operate via Rockwell, Addison, Western, Belmont, & California.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #94 California Temporary Reroute near California/Wellington
ShortDescription: 94 buses temp rerouted NB:California, Diversey, Western, Belmont and Rockwell SB:Rockwell, Addison, Western, Diversey and California near California/Wellington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near California/Wellington due to street blockage near California/Wellington.

Northbound buses will operate via California, Diversey, Western, Belmont and Rockwell including the normal route streets.

Southbound buses will operate via Rockwell, Addison, Western, Diversey and California.

Allow extra travel time.
